short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display ratings from the Internet Movie Database (IMDB) on individual movie pages on Norwegian cinema ticket site Filmweb.no.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension fetches Internet Movie Database (IMDB) rating for the current movie page on http://filmweb.no and displays it next to the other ratings.
